definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: Amorphophallus Campanulatus Powder, Soya Bean Fibre, Starch, Vegetarian Seasoning.
sentences.chinese: 魔芋粉，大豆纖維，澱粉，素食調味料。

sentences.english: Wasabi is horseradish paste, a green horseradish paste.
sentences.chinese: 芥末是用山葵做的調味品，一種綠色的調味品。

sentences.english: Wasabi is horseradish paste, a green horseradish paste.
sentences.chinese: 芥末是用山葵做的調味品，一種綠色的調味品。

sentences.english: Seasoning the raw poultry for bourbon mustard chicken will lock in flavor within the meat.
sentences.chinese: 波旁芥末調味的雞生禽將鎖定在肉的味道。

sentences.english: Can you believe it, he even puts catchup on his ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 你相信嗎，他甚至把調味醬放到冰淇淋裏。

sentences.english: The invention also discloses a method for preparing the high-calcium seasoning.
sentences.chinese: 本發明還公開了這種高鈣調味品的製備方法。

sentences.english: B. The food tasted bad, however Aunt Kit fixed it.
sentences.chinese: 飯菜不好喫，可姬特姑媽還往裏加調味料。

sentences.english: This year enterprises to provide quality-wine, liquor flavoring.
sentences.chinese: 本企業常年提供優質基酒，調味酒。

sentences.english: So, reluctantly, he cut back on the sauces and the onions.
sentences.chinese: 於是，他有些不願意將減少了調味料和洋蔥。

sentences.english: Season with salt, lemon juice, olive oil, cumin powder and white pepper powder.
sentences.chinese: 用食鹽，檸檬汁，孜然粉，橄欖油和胡椒粉調味。

sentences.english: The sauce was zapped with pepper.
He wanted a little more pepper to spice up his rump steak.
sentences.chinese: 他想再加一點胡椒粉給他的菲力牛排調味。

sentences.english: The spice imparts an hot and peppery flavor to the dish.
sentences.chinese: 這種調味品給菜餚添加一種麻辣的味道。

sentences.english: Can you taste pepper in the pudding?
sentences.chinese: 我能嚐到調味品中的洋蘇葉。

sentences.english: Add sea salt and pepper on both sides of the salmon.
sentences.chinese: 三文魚柳以鹽及胡椒調味。

definition: umami, one of the five basic tastes (cookery)
to work extra hours/to do overtime
